reviewText: Hmmm.  I'm questioning if these movies are originals for several reasons: images on the actual disks are not very good quality, on Sense & Sensibility we have to turn up the volume to the maximum on our TV in order to hear it well (though, then we do hear it well!), the pictures aren't crisp as they should be, & in Little Women, the screens in the intro bounce a bit. Persuasion seems to be the best quality of the 3 dvds.  I've always loved these movies & they are more than tolerable to watch, but, I don't like the odd issues we have with them. The DVDs arrived very quickly, though. Package was in decent shape but the edge of the wrapping was torn slightly, which wasn't a big deal. Bought from "Amazing Prime Express".
I like two out of three of the movies. Still worth it to buy.
Disappointed!!! Bag was busted and red hots were everywhere.
Purchased this movie solely for Sense and Sensibility for a friend's birthday party. She loves All three. I personally have not seen Persuasion ;she loves it.
All 3 great movies in 1 pack.  How fun is that???  They have the actors that I prefer in this editions and make for a great time!

I love all the movies! I haven't seen this version of persuasion, but I really like it! I love sense and sensibility, and I absolutely love Little Women! I've grown up watching little women and just loving it all. Over all I think this is a great buy.
Great quality. No issues. All the DVD's play fine and have for over a year now. I get heavy use out of them. Very good service.
